title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture off heat.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: Spices: cumin, garam masala, turmeric, chili powder
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until golden.
Cook onions and tomatoes into a sauce.
Stir in cream and chicken, cook until thickened.
